title: Stella Learning
description: A (spaced repetition) learning app that integrates with note taking apps like Obsidian. Implementing a flat deck using a priority queue to learn items. You are able to create various kinds of learning items, from simple flash cards to cloze images and using files as learn items. And many many more feature all there to help me (and maybe you) to learn more in less time.

title: Personal Website
description: The very website you're on now! A personal space to blog, showcase projects, share my creative work, spit my fellings and opinions on.

title: Stella Invicta
description: As a fan of all grand strategy. It's my personal dream to some day create my own grand strategy game.
